column4:
['Har aadami ko bibi kaa', '
Har aadami ko bibi kaa', '
Gulam hona chahiye', '
Har aadami ko bibi kaa', '
Gulam hona chahiye', '
Ghar mein aate jate hi', '
Salam hona chahiye', '
Pranam hona chahiye', '
Salam hona chahiye', 'Are mood mein ho yeh laxmiji', '
Jo sabhi sukhon ki data', '
Par bigad jaye toh ban', '
Jaye saxat kalika mata', '
Haa saxat kalika mata', '
Mard ki halat mard hi jane', '
Koyi samajh naa paye', '
Idhar hain bibi udhar naukari', '
Bich mein jhole khaye', '
Bichara bich mein jhole khaye', 'Bibi ko sambhale', '
Naukariya chhut jaye re', '
Lekin lekin kuchh bhi ho jaye', '
Are ghar ko banaye rakhane ko', '
Yeh kam hona chahiye', '
Shrimati ji ko bilkul', '
Aaram hona chahiye', 'Aaj hamari shadi ki salagirah thi,', '
Tumhe ghar jaldi aana tha', '
Ham dono ko bahar jana tha', '
Kisi bade hotal mein khana tha', '
Abb kaun banayega khana khana', '
Pakayega tumhara deewana', '
Aaj aisa pakayunga ungali chategi', 'Yeh aata hain yeh chaval hain', '
Yeh dal hain yeh chaval hain', '
Ya hai kela yeh keli karela kareli', '
Yeh muli bichari akeli akeli', '
Khana chatapata aur masaledar,', '
Abb aa jao meri sarakar', '
Tumhe pukare', '
Pahale aap naa naa naa pahale aap,', '
Har aadami ko bibi kaa.']
